Package sk.matus.ksp.guitarist_swiss_knife

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Chord
    This class is a representation of the musical chord.
    ChordActivity
    The activity that contains all of the chord related tools:Finding chords and finger layouts.
    Dependency
    This class is a representation of a functional dependency.
    DependencyScheme
    This class should handle all the actions associated with it's functional dependencies.
    DependencyTerm
    This class represents an atomic term for the Dependency class.
    EqualizerVisualisation
    A kind of tuner visualization that shows the spread of frequencies and their intensity on a 2-dimensional plane
    FingeringThumbnail
    A custom class to show a fingering visualisation
    GaugeVisualisation
    A kind of tuner visualization that shows the frequency on the gauge where the gauge arm deviation describes the frequency deviation from the nearest clear tone.
    GuitarNeck
    Class that represents the physical neck of the guitar and its behaviour
    MainActivity
    The Activity that appears on the start-up.
    MetronomeActivity
    An activity that provides the functionality of a music metronome: Scheduled audio beats.
    ScrapeUGActivity
    Activity that manages the data scraping from the ultimate-guitar.com portal
    Song
    Class that should represent a song including it's content and metadata
    SongDatabaseHelper
    Class that extracts the database on the first run and manipulates it later.
    SongEditorActivity
    An Activity that serves as a simple text editor in which the user is able to add his/her own songs and save them into database
    SongManagementActivity
    Activity that is responsible for the viewing and manipulation of the in-memory database of the songs
    SongViewActivity
    Activity that displays the song and enables the user to manipulate its content to limited extent (without changing the data in the database that holds the song)
    ToggleableRadioButton
    A custom RadioButton that can be unchecked (even within a RadioGroup component)
    ToneUtils
    This class should handle all the request regarding tones and their properties
    TunerActivity
    The activity that records audio from the microphone in real time and presents the user with visualisations of this audio
    TunerPagerAdapter
    Adapter that enables several visualization of the tuner to be displayed in the same activity
